lead_paragraph: Diego Dzodan was freed a day after he was arrested over Facebook’s noncompliance with orders seeking information from a WhatsApp messaging account.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Vice President of Facebook Is Freed From Brazilian Jail

snippet: Diego Dzodan was freed a day after he was arrested over Facebook’s noncompliance with orders seeking information from a WhatsApp messaging account.
abstract: Brazilian authorities release Facebook executive Diego Dzodan from custody after judge overturns arrest order.
